full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/15/2023 TO: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Dear Sirs. I am respectfully presenting to you, my financial status and the plea to grant residence to my mother, to whom I promise to fully support her needs; I declare that I have not been at any time a burden or a problem for this country of ours, and my mother never will. Enclosed exhibit: A Last Individual Income Tax Return, to prove my total income. B Last Employer's Quarterly Federal Tax Return, to prove that I am giving work to others and that I am solvent in my taxes obligations. C To prove that I have no high financial burden but the mortgage payment in my property. D The three properties that I own. E This year declaration of my business income and expenses. F Last Bank Statements. I also include proof that my wife and I are duly licensed to practice dentistry in the State of California. I declare that I have no outstanding balance in any Credit Card and all the payments are current in my obligations. I include birth certificates of my mother and mine, my U.S. Passport. Truly yours Adino Bladimir Cruz
